creator: Puy du Fou
descriptionHtml:
Download the free Puy du Fou app and plan your visit the easy way - never miss a moment with this ideal companion to the visitors guide issued at the entrance to the main park.

The app keeps you up to date with the daily show schedules, has information about our restaurants and eateries and helps you find the many other facilities and services around the Puy du Fou.

Create your own schedule by selecting the shows you'd like to see and the times you'd like to see them - the app will sort them in your chosen order and tell you when the doors open.

The app can be your guide, too, showing you where you are on the park map, how to get to your next attraction and how far it is.

You can also list the shows, restaurants and other facilities by distance and let the app help you find the nearest service to you.

Experience our main shows in the language of your choice thanks to the ‘simultaneous translation’ feature, which can be activated at any time during a performance.

The Puy du Fou also provides a free audio description service to allow blind and partially-sighted visitors to enjoy the major shows in the Grand Parc and the Cinéscénie.

Access all your travel documents and passes through your account (ticket sales, hotel vouchers, restaurants, complimentary services, etc.) to make your visit even easier.

Visit the Puy du Fou bookshop. Discover new chapters every day when you sign up for our e-books and audiobooks. (only available in French).
descriptionShort: L'Histoire n'attend que vous !

appDetails.developerAddress:
Le Puy du Fou
CS 70025
85590 Les Epesses
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Nouveautés :
- Enrichissement et mise à jour des contenus.
- Librairie du Puy du Fou : publication d'une nouvelle oeuvre
- Système d'information en temps réel

descriptionShort: History is waiting for you!

appDetails.developerAddress:
Le Puy du Fou
CS 70025
85590 Les Epesses
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this new version, you can discover:
• A map customized according to your profile
• More details about our shows, restaurants, and hotels.
• A real-time display of the attendance of the shows
• Answers to your most frequently asked questions
• A chatbot answering immediately your needs
• An access map to get to the park
• Additional restaurants to order your meals online

title: Puy du Fou - France

container.value:
Le Puy du Fou
CS 70025
85590 Les Epesses

creator: Puy du Fou
descriptionHtml:
Twice voted "Best Theme Park in the World" Puy du Fou offers a highly original experience with spectacular shows and novel hotels that propel visitors through the centuries.

Our app is the ideal companion during every step of your journey through time, from its preparation to your return to the 21st century.

Before your visit:

- Download your tickets and reservations in the app to save time at the entrance!*
- Consult the daily show schedules 48h before your arrival and anticipate your program!
- Find all our services and facilities for your trip and your stay at the Puy du Fou.
*Only reservations beginning with “MI”,”RI”,”WI” and “DI” can be added to the app.

During your time travel:

- Explore the map and filter your points of interest.
- Follow in live what you have done and what you have to see.
- Let our GPS guide you according to your pace.
- Get live updates of the opening, the closing, and the filling of our main shows.
- Experience our main shows in the language of your choice thanks to the ‘simultaneous translation’ feature.
- Spare your time by ordering your meal online with the Click & Collect

At your arrival, we invite you to connect to the free Wi-Fi PUYDUFOU to benefit from an optimal experience of the app.

The Puy du Fou France app is available in 6 languages: French, English, Spanish, German, Dutch and Russian.

By downloading our free Puy du Fou application, you accept the general terms of use available here:

https://www.puydufou.com/france/sites/default/files/2021-06/cgu_application_mobile.pdf

----

We frequently update our app to offer the best experience. Your feedback is precious to improve the app, share with us your remarks at the following address: supportapp@puydufou.com
descriptionShort: To guide you throughout your visit, download the Puy du Fou France app.

- Get live updates of the opening, the closing, and the filling of our main shows.
- Experience our main shows in the language of your choice thanks to the ‘simultaneous translation’ feature.
- Spare your time by ordering your meal online with the Click & Collect

At your arrival, we invite you to connect to the free Wi-Fi PUYDUFOU to benefit from an optimal experience of the app.

The Puy du Fou France app is available in 6 languages: French, English, Spanish, German, Dutch and Russian.

By downloading our free Puy du Fou application, you accept the general terms of use available here:

https://www.puydufou.com/france/sites/default/files/2021-06/cgu_application_mobile.pdf

----

We frequently update our app to offer the best experience. Your feedback is precious to improve the app, share with us your remarks at the following address: supportapp@puydufou.com

appDetails.developerAddress:
Le Puy du Fou
CS 70025
85590 Les Epesses

title: Puy du Fou - France

container.value:
Le Puy du Fou
CS 70025
85590 Les Epesses

creator: Puy du Fou
descriptionHtml:
Our application accompanies you at every stage of your journey through time, from its preparation to your return to the 21st century.

Before your visit:

- Upload your tickets and bookings into the app to save time on arrival*.
- Create your visit up to 48 hours before your arrival to anticipate your programme!
- Find all our services to facilitate your visit and your stay at Puy du Fou.
*Only bookings beginning with "MI", "RI", "WI" and "DI" can be added to the application.

During your journey through time :

- Explore the map and filter your points of interest.
- Follow in real time what you have seen and what you still have to see.
- Let our GPS guide you at your pace.
- Get live updates on the opening, closing and filling of the main shows.
- Benefit from simultaneous translation as well as audio description and subtitling of our main shows.

On arrival, we invite you to connect to the free PUYDUFOU Wi-Fi in order to benefit from an optimal user experience.


The Puy du Fou France application is available in 5 languages: French, English, Spanish, German and Dutch.



By downloading our free Puy du Fou France application, you agree to the terms of use available here :

https://www.puydufou.com/france/sites/default/files/2021-06/cgu_application_mobile.pdf


----

We regularly update our application to offer you the best possible experience. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve the application, so please don't hesitate to share your suggestions with us at the following address: supportapp@puydufou.com
descriptionShort: To guide you throughout your visit, download the Puy du Fou France app.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Le Puy du Fou
CS 70025
85590 Les Epesses
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in 2023:
- Scan the QR code of your ticket to add it directly into the application (only valid for tickets purchased on the Puy du Fou website)
- Share your personalized visit with a friend or family member
- Benefit from English subtitles for the shows (list of shows concerned in the application)
- Let yourself be guided by the GPS thanks to the addition of the names of the alleys
- Discover the information about the new show "Le Mime et L'Etoile"

- Upload your tickets and bookings into the app to save time on arrival*.
- Create your visit up to 48 hours before your arrival to anticipate your programme!
- Find all our services to facilitate your visit and your stay at Puy du Fou.
*Only bookings beginning with "MI", "RI", "WI" and "DI" can be added to the application.

During your journey through time :

- Explore the map and filter your points of interest.
- Follow in real time what you have seen and what you still have to see.
- Let our GPS guide you at your pace.
- Get live updates on the opening, closing and filling of the main shows.
- Benefit from simultaneous translation as well as audio description and subtitling of our main shows.

On arrival, we invite you to connect to the free PUYDUFOU Wi-Fi in order to benefit from an optimal user experience.


The Puy du Fou France application is available in 5 languages: French, English, Spanish, German and Dutch.



By downloading our free Puy du Fou France application, you agree to the terms of use available here :

https://www.puydufou.com/france/sites/default/files/2021-06/cgu_application_mobile.pdf


----

We regularly update our application to offer you the best possible experience. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve the application, so please don't hesitate to share your suggestions with us at the following address: supportapp@puydufou.com
descriptionShort: To guide you throughout your visit, download the Puy du Fou France app.
